Elections
=========

**INTERNET POSTING REQUIREMENT FOR
POLITICAL SUBDIVISION**

**CITY OF WOODVILLE, TEXAS
ELECTION INFORMATION**

**Address:          City of Woodville**

**400 West Bluff**

**Woodville, TX
75979**

**Telephone:       409-283-2234**

**Website:** [**www.woodville-tx.gov**](http://www.woodville-tx.gov)

**Election
Contact Information:**

**Danita Skinner**

**City Secretary**

[**danita@woodville-tx.gov**](mailto:danita@woodville-tx.gov)

| **Kelly Dillard, Alderman Place 2** | **2026** |
| **Paula M. Jones, Alderman Place 3** | **2027** |
| **Mike Cabaniss, Alderman Place 4** | **2026** |
| **Lee P. Mann, Alderman Place 5** | **2027** |

\*City elections are held each year on the 1st Tuesday after
the 1st Monday in November

Even Number Years: Mayor, Alderman
Place 2, Alderman Place 4

Odd Number Years: Alderman Place 1,
Alderman Place 3, Alderman Place 5

**UPCOMING
ELECTIONS INFORMATION:**

**Tuesday,
November 3, 2026**

**Office(s):          Mayor**

**Alderman Place 1
(unexpired term to 2027)**

**Alderman Place 2**

**Alderman Place 4**

**First
Day to File:             July 18, 2026**

**Last Day
to File:             August 17, 2026 by
5:00 p.m.**

LOCATION:    EARLY VOTING**

County Nutrition Center**

**201
Willow**

**Woodville,
TX 75979**

DAY**

Masonic Lodge**

**310
W Holly Street**

**Woodville,
TX 75979**

**Woodville
Lion’s Den**

**775
US Hwy 190 East**

**Woodville,
TX 75979**

**Woodville
Fire Department**

**215
Walt Davis Drive**

**Woodville,
TX 75979**

**REQUIREMENTS FOR CANDIDACY:**

**Candidates applying for office for the City of Woodville must meet the
requirements per Section 141 of the Texas Election Code as shown below:**

* **Be
  a United States citizen**
* **Be
  at least eighteen (18) years of age**
* **Be
  a qualified voter of the City of Woodville for at least six (6) months at
  the time of filing.**
* **Be
  a resident of Texas for at least one (1) year immediately preceding the
  election.**
* **Not
  have been determined by a final judgment of a court to be totally mentally
  incapacitated, or partially mentally incapacitated without the right to
  vote. (Texas Election Code)**
* **Not
  have been finally convicted of a felony or if so convicted, have been
  pardoned or otherwise released from the resulting disabilities. (Texas
  Election Code)**

**FUTURE ELECTION DATES**

* **November 2, 2027 - City of Woodville
  General Election for**

**Alderman Place 1, Alderman Place
3, Alderman Place 5**

* **November 7, 2028 - City of Woodville
  General Election for**

**Mayor, Alderman Place 2,
Alderman Place 4**

Index
-----

* [How do I register to vote?](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/elections#63043130-84C9-438F-A34A-B187297BB695)
* [How do I vote absentee?](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/elections#279C5EB4-573E-47E5-87DE-CE40F7D83E4D)
* [Where do I vote?](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/elections#45D6A8FB-42BD-4166-A6F7-98FECD7CCE46)
* [Who should I contact with further questions?](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/elections#F5CEB2D2-65CC-4F78-9CE8-BDADE5DC2B06)

How do I register to vote?
--------------------------

You may obtain an application for voter registration at the Tyler County Annex, the Tyler County Clerk's Office or online using the following link:

[Register to Vote](https://www.votetexas.gov/register-to-vote/index.html)

How do I vote absentee?
-----------------------

Contact the Tyler County Clerk's Office to obtain a form to vote absentee. (409) 283-2281.

Where do I vote?
----------------

* Early Voting  - Tyler County Nutrition Center, 201 Willow St., Woodville, TX
* Election Day

         Woodville Fire Station (Precinct 2, Box 18) - 215 Walt Davis Dr., Woodville, TX

         Magnolia Masonic Lodge (Precinct 2, Box 2) - 310 W. Holly St., Woodville, TX

         Woodville Lions Den (Precinct, Box 17) - 775 US Hwy 190 East, Woodville, TX

         \*\*\* The voting precinct and box number should be identified on you voter's registration card.  If you are unsure where to vote, please contact the Tyler County Clerk's Office (409) 283-2281.

Who should I contact with further questions?
--------------------------------------------

The city secretary is the point of contact for City of Woodville elections.

*Danita Skinner*  
*City Secretary*  
*(409) 283-2234*  
*danita@woodville-tx.gov*

#### Location

400 W. Bluff Street Woodville, Texas 75979

Ph. (409) 283-2234 Fax (409) 283-8412

#### Contact Us

Hours 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Monday - Friday (closed noon -12:30 p.m. for lunch)

If you are in need of assistance after hours and on weekends call (409) 283-2172
